 Use Identity Provider Authentication for S3 Connectors

 Get a more secure and streamlined connection experience with identity provider (IdP) authentication when ingesting data from an S3 bucket. Manage credentials more easily with enhanced security protocols.

 When: This feature is being rolled out in July 2024.

 Where: This change applies to Data Cloud in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions.

 How: Choose IDP-based authentication when setting up a new S3 Connector.
title: Identity Provider Authentication for Salesforce Data Cloud
